attributes.action: examine scholarship process and PhD applications
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Applications for UK govt funding should be on the basis of the legitimacy of the project, it's potential benefit to science, the economy and academia as well as   endorsement by international bodies, such as UNICEF, WHO and the UN, not by university employees. Commendably, post - graduate student applications are often more profession - lead in terms of content - rather than for the simple reason of earning cash for universities, keen to get as many students as possibe to attend their courses. The current scholarship system lacks a system and stifles innovation - with very limited support for those talented and gifted academics with good project initiatives.
